actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution designating certain election days as legal public holidays, and designating November 11 as Veterans Day.

summary.text: Designates as election day the first Tuesday after the first Monday in November in 1976 and every second year thereafter and makes such day a legal public holiday. Designates November 11 as Veterans Day.

titles.title: Joint resolution designating certain election days as legal public holidays, and designating November 11 as Veterans Day.
